price: “Kung sakaling mayroon tayong isang paalaala mula sa mga sinauna,
arabic: لَوۡ أَنَّ عِندَنَا ذِكۡرٗا مِّنَ ٱلۡأَوَّلِينَ

version.title: Filipino (Tagalog) Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tagalog by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: law anna ʿindanā dhik'ran mina al-awalīna
